title: Taken By The Priest
description: My name is Miranda Michaels and I am a call girl. Last we met you saw a glimpse into my life. I’m the one you come to when you want to indulge your wicked fantasies, the ones you’re too scared to even confess. He’s the one you seek out when you desire absolution for all the sins you committed.A lifetime ago he stole my soul and played a hand in creating the woman I am today.Now it’s time to revisit the past and confront my demons. This journey back in my hometown of Lavenham, Suffolk is not one meant for pleasure.I once believed in fairytales and happily ever afters, I saved myself for the one.This is the story of me going back to where it all began.And it all starts with him.Taken by the Priest is Book 2 in the Lessons In Sin series but can be read as a standalone.
author: Fiona   Lust
